2023/06/26 22:37:09 - The text is :: 'Sobre a vaga
Title: DevOps/TechOps Engineer

Type: Fulltime Long-Term Contract

Location: Remote

About the Role:
We are seeking an experienced DevOps/TechOps Engineer to collaborate with numerous teams in charge of creating, implementing, onboarding, and supporting one or more of our software platforms. You will collaborate and troubleshoot issues with our data conversion team, support team, system administration team, and software development team. This position is ideal for someone who enjoys automating procedures that improve the effectiveness of the entire team.

You MUST have good spoken English.
You MUST be primarily available during 7 am and 4 pm Mountain Time (MT)

Laptop and equipment will be provided to you. Fulltime long-term contract, with benefits included in your monthly pay.

You will be responsible for the following:
Designing, constructing, and managing workflows and processes for the various software platforms, both on-premise and cloud-based
Building and maintaining workflows
Back-up to assist the systems administration team
Play a major role in the validation and management of final releases.

Qualifications That Make You a Great Fit:
4+ years experience as a DevOps engineer, or experience as a developer transitioned to DevOps.
Post secondary education in Computer Science, IT, Mathematics, Business, Engineering or equivalent experience.
Ability to identify processes for improvement and incorporate appropriate change management techniques.
Experience building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines specifically in Azure DevOps
Experience with release management processes incorporating pre-release validation.
AWS CDK Infrastructure as Code (TypeScript) or equivalent experience with AWS CloudFormation or similar tools (such as Terraform)
Experience deploying and maintaining a Laravel stack using Angular (PHP, MySQL, Angular)
Comfortable with both BASH and PowerShell Scripting
Understand role-based security and security best practices.
Have used and understand version control systems (GIT)
Worked previously using SCRUM methods
Working knowledge of VS Code and Visual Studio
Strong written and verbal communication skills including technical writing skills
Advanced English is required.
Additional Skills That Make You a Great Fit:
Experience with both AWS and Azure cloud providers and building scripts manipulating Azure (PowerShell ARM) and AWS (CDK and CloudFormation). Experience with Microsoft SQL Server, PostgreSQL and MySQL is highly desirable.
Experience with automating the building and deployment of WinForms applications.
Developer experience in C# is desirable.
Understanding of building and deploying Docker containers
Experience automating IT administration and processes.
Usage and maintenance of Elastic (ELK stack)
Having used JIRA project management tool
Some exposure to Window Active Directory and Windows Server Administration

Perks and Benefits:
A collaborative environment where you can enhance your skills with likeminded developers and engineers.
Room for growth to senior level positions
Referral bonuses
PEO benefits and profit sharing
A member of our global candidate network to enhance your career long term.
Bi-Weekly pay!!!'

Title: Lead Software Engineer - Renewable Energy Technical Analysis
Location: Brazil
Language: Fluent English, ability to speak other languages helpful

We seek a talented, organized, enthusiastic, and team-oriented Software Engineer to lead the development of technical analysis software and cloud-based solutions.

About ArcVera Renováveis (refer to ArcVera.com)
ArcVera Renewables is a US-headquartered, leading, growing, flexible, and exciting global renewable energy technical consultancy that has been providing finance-grade commercial and technical services for hybrid, wind, solar, and battery storage energy projects for over three decades. We are dedicated to delivering best-in-class services across the renewable energy project lifecycle to meet the needs of landowners, project developers, investors, project owners, and operators globally. We have subsidiary offices in Brazil, South Africa, and India.

Position: Lead Software Engineer - Renewable Energy Technical Analysis
ArcVera Renewables is seeking an experienced software engineer to lead the development of technical analysis software and cloud-based solutions.
You will be responsible for developing, maintaining, and supporting software solutions related to wind energy, solar energy, battery storage, risk analysis, green hydrogen, and hybrid renewables solutions.
Your role will involve a wide range of tasks, including planning, writing, documenting, testing, debugging, and ensuring the quality of the software for use across technical disciplines.
Additionally, you will be responsible for training users on the software and managing databases related to renewable energy technical analysis.

Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain software applications and analytical tools for wind, solar, battery storage, and other renewable energy-related applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
Add to the existing codebase and write new efficient, user-friendly, and reliable code in C#, SQL, Java, and Python to implement software solutions.
Conduct thorough testing and debugging of software to ensure high-quality deliverables and a comprehensive and easy-to-use user experience.
Create comprehensive documentation for software development processes, including design documents, user manuals, and technical specifications.
Train users on software functionalities and provide technical support when required.
Manage databases related to renewable energy, including wind resource data, solar resource data, project availability, component failure rates, performance test results, and operation and maintenance costs.
Operate the company's software development projects, ensuring adherence to budgets and schedules.
Lead and mentor a small team of software developers, providing guidance, feedback, and support.
Collaborate with stakeholders, including clients and internal teams, to understand software requirements and address any concerns or issues.
Stay updated with industry trends and advancements in software development, renewable energy technologies, and relevant programming languages.

Qualifications:
Required:
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, Meteorology, Engineering,
Physics, or a related field. Master's degree preferred.
Proven experience as a Software Engineer, preferably in the renewable energy sector or related industry.
Proficient in C#, Python, PHP, My SQL Workbench, and Java coding languages.
Proficient with Amazon Web Services and related cloud-solutions and cloud-databases.
Strong knowledge of software development methodologies, debugging techniques, and software testing.
Experience with creating and maintaining efficient database management systems and data analysis.
Familiarity with renewable energy concepts, wind energy, and solar energy analysis is desirable.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English, proficiency in other languages is helpful.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.
Ability to maintain confidentiality and protect intellectual property rights.
Leadership skills to manage and mentor a small team of software developers.
Flexibility to travel and at times work remotely from anywhere in the world, collaborating closely with colleagues in the company's international offices (United States, Brazil, South Africa, India).

Job Type: Full-time
This is a full-time position under PJ Brazil contract law in a rewarding collaborative remote team environment, with occasional in-person team meetings. Compensation will be commensurate with experience. This is a remote position. Occasional travel (30%) may be required. Most of the work will involve online, email, and video collaboration. The candidate must be authorized to work in Brazil.

Benefits:
● Compensation commensurate with experience
● Results-based company bonus
● Remote work and flexible schedule

Key Performance Indicators:
● Delivery of on-time analysis products and reports with minimal/near-zero errors.
● Achieve designated monthly and annual productivity targets for maximized client time.
● Demonstrated ability to engage in complex tasks with improving efficiency.
● Adherence to stated individual performance goals on a yearly basis.'

Global Technology Leader Digital & Data Analytics (h/f/x)

#ChangeMakers

Ready to make an impact?

Straumann® stands for premium Swiss quality, precision and innovation delivering confidence in dentistry, backed by the largest global scientific network. As the global leader in implantology, we deliver cutting-edge innovations that are regarded as industry benchmarks and disruptive technological breakthroughs, supported by long-term scientific evidence. We push the boundaries to enable the next generation of dental care.

#WeChangeDentistry every day – and we want you to be a part of it!

We are looking for a Global Technology Leader Digital & Data Analytics (m/f/x) to join our Global Technology & Processes department. In his or her primary role, the incumbent acts as a champion in the the process of Digital & Data Analytics within the entire group supporting digital transformation. As such, he/she must understand how to add maximum value to business processes through disruptive and applied innovation, standardization, and improvement of existing solutions, so that the company can offer world-class products to our customers. As a Global Technology Lead, the role is also to connect all communities of local experts to build a solid roadmap for successful technology development and integration within the entire group.

In your role you will…

Develop and coordinate the community of practice (CoP) of experts from the manufacturing sites to develop and pilot best practices sharing platform.
Represents the manufacturing sites for global procurement category management to ensure an optimal process standardization amongst the group
Engage with R&D teams to participate in the development of an innovation culture within the company, focused on customer needs (internal and external), on safety, on efficiency and performance
Partner with D&T team to build an efficient and robust technology integration between automation and IT layers (real time and in both directions). As well to make sure that network security requirements will be applied within automation
Supports special projects when some expertise is required for his/her technology (e.g., New manufacturing site, E2E automation projects,…) and participate in the development of an innovation culture within the company, focused on customer needs (internal and external), on safety, on efficiency and performance
Understand the projects needs formulated by internal customers. To do this, he/she must understand and analyze in the existing flows, constraints and waste
Integrate the notions of availability, performance and quality in the framework of the projects
Develop solutions that are mature enough to be used quickly in operations with a minimum of residual technological risks
Go in the production to understand current and future needs as well as operational constraints
Formalize the processes concerned in scientific and engineering terms. Relying on reliable data

We are looking for …

Engineer in Computer science or Automation or training closely related to production processes. Several years of experience could be significant and equivalent for this position
Minimum 5 years of technical and industrial experience that has called upon important intellectual faculties
Minimum 5 years in the medical device industry and knowledge of standards related
Logic of technical organization linked to production flows, an advantage
Understanding of the needs of an industrial environment, experience in mechanical industry, surface treatment or industrial packaging would be an asset
English speaking, additional language is an advantage
Result oriented. Agile, fast, pragmatic, intelligent and energetic
Leadership skills and ability to manage stress and decision making
Entrepreneurial spirit, able to take ownership of a task and commit to success even facing difficulty
Accustomed to organizing, leading and motivating a project team in a matrix environment
Able to manage a schedule and influence activities to meet deadlines even under difficult conditions. Able to carry responsibility, accustomed to and able to delegate wisely
Excellent communication skills and ability to build trust within the team and the environment
Visionary, able to work in a global approach but also able to deal with details

Additional information

Activity rate : 100%

Starting date : ASAP / to be discussed

Contract type : CDI

Place of work : Globally

What can you expect from us?

An agile and ambitious environment: We are #ChangeMakers.

Open, friendly colleagues who collaborate and support each other: We are #Players+Learners.

The freedom to create and engage in an environment with the opportunity to develop yourself as a person and in your career.

To work for the No. 1 in Dentistry and one of the leading MedTech companies.

And many other things!

The Straumann Group is proud to be an equal opportunities organization. We truly value diversity in all its forms recognizing that to truly deliver value to our patients, we must reflect our patient diversity in our internal workforce. Together we are creating smiles and restoring confidence.

2023/06/26 22:37:29 - The text is :: 'Sobre a vaga
Como Analista de Inbound Marketing (Marketo), o seu objetivo será cuidar para que toda a estrutura de campanhas no Marketo seja executada e programada dentro do prazo.

Essa vaga é para quem gosta de configurar e-mails, newsletters, Landing Pages, fluxos de automação e toda a parametrização, para que as campanhas sejam ativas e possam ser analisadas com o objetivo de melhorias constantes.

Estamos buscando um profissional pleno/sênior para esta vaga. O trabalho será operacional – na configuração e montagem das campanhas – e estratégico – para analisar e propor melhorias.

Você irá trabalhar em um time dedicado da BRSA, que atende uma multinacional de cibersegurança.

Qual é o perfil de profissional que buscamos?
Senso crítico para fazer perguntas e buscar respostas através dos dados.
Senso de urgência para agir de forma proativa e efetiva na resolução de problemas e novas oportunidades em projetos.
Com foco na meta para sugerir melhorias e alterações de rota quando necessário.
Comunicativo para transitar em várias áreas e projetos.
Vendedor, no sentido em apresentar soluções e pontos de vista.
Organizado com a gestão de tempo, tarefas e agenda de reuniões.
Que goste de trabalhar de forma 100% remota e como CLT.
Que esteja alinhado com os valores da BRSA:
Aqui não se faz sacanagem.
Foco no foco do cliente.
Fazemos com excelência.
Iniciativa para trazer soluções.
Sentimento de time e cuidado.
Que tenha conhecimento de estratégias, como:
Inbound Marketing
Account Based Marketing (desejável)
Que resida em Campinas e região ou São Paulo e região

Se você se identifica com o perfil, sua responsabilidade será:
Todas as responsabilidades abaixo serão desenvolvidas no Marketo, plataforma de automação da Adobe, com base no conteúdo e peças desenvolvidas pelo time.

Desenvolvimento de e-mails
Desenvolvimento de newsletter
Desenvolvimento de Landing Pages
Automação de marketing
Parametrização de campanhas
Alinhamento com cliente para ativação das campanhas
Análise e apresentação resultados
Recomendação de melhorias
Levantar hipóteses de melhoria com base na análise de dados.
Apresentar relatórios mensais e trimestrais.

Salário e Benefícios
Salário compatível com o mercado
CLT
Day off de aniversário
Plano de Saúde (Porto Seguro)
Participação nos lucros (PLR)
Vale refeição e alimentação (Cartão Flash)
Seguro de Vida'

2023/06/26 22:37:41 - The text is :: 'Sobre a vaga
Job Description

A gente busca sempre um jeito ágil, prático e descomplicado para fazer a cerveja chegar do campo ao copo. E tudo isso só é possível porque temos um time incrível que encara cada desafio como uma oportunidade para fazer diferente.

Se você tá afim de desenvolver soluções inovadoras para a maior cervejaria do mundo, vem com a gente!

Essa oportunidade está disponível tanto para home office quanto para híbrido (em uma de nossas unidades - Blumenau/SC, Maringá/PR e Sorocaba/SP).

Responsibilities and assignments

Fazer parte do planejamento, otimização e manutenção de nossas plataformas;
Propor e desenvolver nossa infraestrutura, seja atualizando os atuais componentes ou as reconstruindo;
Relação e integração com time de Engenharia para identificar problemas e resolvê-los;
Desenvolver sistemas provendo autonomia, monitoramento e escalabilidade para os times;
Ser responsável pelo funcionamento de nossa plataforma integrada aos demais times.

Requirements And Qualifications

Experiência em Python (FastApi /Django e/ou Flask);
Experiência em Frontend, SPA's e Frameworks baseados em componentes (Angular, React ou VueJS);
Experiência com TDD e Testes Unitários;
Experiência com ORM e/ou banco de dados (SQL Server);
Experiência com Injeção de Dependências, Separação em Camadas, Solid e Clean Code;
Experiência com Code Review;
Vivência com metodologias ágeis.

Diferenciais:

Experiência com C# ( .Net Core );
Experiência com Banco de Dados Não-Relacional;
Experiência com Ferramentas de Mensageria;
Experiência com Microsserviços;
Experiência com Azure DevOps.

Additional information

Jornada de trabalho de 40 horas semanais;
Vale refeição ou alimentação;
Vale transporte;
PPR;
Plano de saúde;
Convênio odontológico;
Auxílio educação;
Self Learning (auxílio em cursos, certificações e idiomas);
Seguro de vida;
Empresa cidadã (licença maternidade e paternidade) e presente do bebê;
Mercadotech (aplicativo de desconto nos produtos AMBEV);
Day off de aniversário;
Banco de horas;
Brahma Express;
Gympass;
Zenklub;
14º salário;
Self-friday (sexta-feira à tarde livre para estudos e autocuidado).

OLÁ, SOMOS A AMBEV TECH! 🍻

E ninguém une tecnologia e cerveja como a gente! Temos a missão de transformar o dia a dia da maior cervejaria do planeta. Fazemos isso com um time incrível de pessoas apaixonadas e unidas em um único propósito: mudar o mundo com tecnologia.

Buscamos entregar as melhores experiências e trazer soluções ágeis e descomplicadas para fazer a bebida chegar do campo ao copo. Todos os dias, impactamos milhares de pessoas. Cada brinde tem um pouquinho de nós. Essa é a nossa jornada, é o que fazemos e o que somos.

Somos feitos de pessoas

Acreditamos na diversidade e no quanto ela é capaz de fazer a gente evoluir. É através da pluralidade de ideias, de experiências e opiniões que conseguimos pensar fora da caixa e trazer soluções inovadoras. Pra gente, diversidade e inclusão são assuntos sérios! Por isso, contamos com um Comitê de Autenticidade Tech para olhar essas questões com muito carinho e responsabilidade.

Estamos no mundo todo

Também somos Ambev Global Tech. Integramos o hub de tecnologia global da Anheuser-Busch InBev (ABInBev), uma multinacional formada por um grupo de cervejarias com sede em Leuven, na Bélgica, e com outros escritórios globais em diversos países, incluindo Estados Unidos, México, Índia e Brasil.

Vem com a gente!

Nossas unidades estão presentes em Blumenau (SC), Maringá (PR), São Paulo (SP), Campinas (SP), Jaguariúna (SP), e Sorocaba (SP), e contamos ainda com um time remoto de vários cantos do Brasil! Já somos mais de 2.000 pessoas encarando cada desafio pra fazer diferente, mas queremos ir muito mais longe. Pra chegar lá, precisamos fortalecer nossa equipe!

Tá afim de criar soluções para a maior cervejaria do planeta? Causar impacto, trazer inovação e transformar o mundo? Então, vem com a gente 😊

We’re here for tech and beer.'

We are seeking new talent!

Tata Consultancy Services is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that delivers real results to global business, ensuring a level of certainty no other firm can match. TCS offers a consulting-led, integrated portfolio of IT, BPS,infrastructure, engineering and assurance services. This is delivered through its unique Global Network Delivery Model™, recognised as the benchmark of excellence in software development. A part of the Tata group, India’s largest industrial conglomerate, TCS has over 300,000 of the world’s best-trained consultants in 46 countries. The company generated consolidated revenues of US $13.4 billion for year ended March 31, 2014 and is listed on the National Stock Exchange and Bombay Stock Exchange in India. For more information, visit us at www.tcs.com..

Skills/experience required.
1. Experience in writing stored procedures
2. Experience in ETL automation using any programming knowledge
3. Experience in using CI/CD pipelines for testing
4. ETL testing experience in validating data pipelines
5. Excellent SQL skills
6. Good experience in Test data creation and management
7. Good in communication, Agile & QA process
Preferred
Azure Data Factory and Data Bricks experience

Activities
Understanding the application landscape and integrations
Design test cases and queries to perform ETL validations as per the changes/updates
Test data creation and management
Write stored procedures to validate the transformations and its accuracy
Coordinating/guiding the team to visualize, strategize and perform ETL testing
Understanding conventional and cloud testing strategies to be aligned to the application enhancements
Communicate and coordinate the integration testing with different programs
Working in an agile team and delivering the team goals

Additional Information
CLT Hiring - TCS Brazil
Attractive salary and benefits

Samsung is looking for an eStore BI and Data architecture Manager to join our Local team located in São Paulo.

Roles and responsibilities:
Make insights thru data driven in order to improve our eStore Sales Operation (Sales and Target Plan, %SEDA portion, Premium Sales (eStore e SEDA), Promotions, Channel, Sell out Platform).
Develop Data base to support eStore areas - Sales, Marketing, New business, Customer Sales, Logistics, etc.
Make the Data architecture for eStore, in order to have a Dashboard with Sales, Traffic, Conversion, Marketing actions for MX and CE Division.
Integrated information for total eStore 2 Divisions 12 Categories - MX (Mobile, NPC, Tablet, Wearables) and CE (TV, monitor, Audio, Wash, REF, Air Cond, Vaccum Cleaner), with details by Categories.
Support and presentation for preparation of weekly reports and presentations of results and strategies to the Top Management of Executive reports.
Responsible for the Information of all eStore KPIs to communicate to the company (Sales by Product, by Channel, Traffic, conversion, etc).
Analysis of Sales by Division, by Category, by Model, by Premium, eStore %portion, Growth rate, Achievement rate, Channel improvements, main KPIs, etc.
Analysis of opportunities for Sales increase by Product in the channels – Shop.com, Samsung APP, EPP Program, Marketplace 3P.
Interface between eStore and SDS systems team, managing Projects like BI Dashboard in Tableau.
Training and sharing of knowledge to support eStore areas.


Background & Experience

Bachelor degree: Adminstration, Engeneering, etc
Data architecture experience
Advanced English Fluent;
Excel Advanced, SQL
Tableau, Phyton will be a plus
VTEX platform
Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics
Data base development experience;
Experience in e-commerce will be a plus;
Knowledge in Reports and Management Analysis;
Comfortable with performance data and metrics
Teamwork, leadership, Hands on profile, with analytical skills, sense of urgency and ease of interpersonal relations.

Samsung Electronics is committed to employing a diverse workforce and provides Equal Employment opportunities for all individuals regardless of race, color, religion, gender, age, national origin, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a protected veteran, genetic information, status as a qualified individual with a disability, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Interested?

We are waiting for you.
Apply for our position!'

Descrição da empresa

Somos uma empresa global, líder em serviços de informação, conhecida no restante do mundo como Experian. Nos grandes momentos da vida, como a compra de um carro, a ida de um filho para a faculdade ou mesmo a abertura e expansão de um negócio, estamos presentes para empoderar consumidores e clientes a administrarem seus dados com confiança.

Contamos com mais de 20.000 pessoas operando em mais de 44 países; e, ao investirmos nelas, em tecnologia e em inovação, podemos ajudar negócios a se transformar e comunidades a prosperar, permitindo que mais pessoas se sintam incluídas nas oportunidades disponíveis. É dessa forma que todos os dias entregamos o nosso propósito de criar um futuro melhor.

Venha descobrir um mundo inesperado com a gente!

Descrição da vaga

Área: Data Office
Subárea: Data Operations

Quais serão suas principais entregas?

Captar balanços patrimoniais e documentos cadastrais para todos os clientes da companhia e conforme estratégia;
Fazer abordagem por e-mail e ou telefone;
Realizar processos de captação visando melhoria contínua.

Como será o seu dia a dia?

Atuará no time de Captação de Dados Empresariais no processo de captação de dados financeiros de pessoas jurídica; cadastro dos documentos advindos de clientes e ou fornecedores;
Atuará nos canais de atendimento para captação de dados financeiros;
Você terá contato com as frentes de aquisição de dados, análise de empresas, qualidade e governança garantindo que seja oferecida soluções para os clientes.
Será responsável por captar informações econômico-financeiras de pessoas jurídicas, com objetivo de manter a base de empresas Serasa Experian atualizada, a fim de apoiar decisões de crédito e de negócios, gerando valor para nossos profissionais, clientes, acionistas, fornecedores e sociedade;
Ademais, conduzirá o fluxo de captar, recepcionar e criticar, para que o time de análise realize a inclusão e análise dos dados das empresas que fazem parte das revistas Franquias, Valor 1000 e Agronegócio, com o objetivo de compor os anuários.

Qualificações

O que estamos buscando em você!

Formação superior completa/cursando em ciências contábeis, economia ou administração;
Acompanhar os prazos de entrega das demandas;
Ter experiência na área contábil e ou administrativa;
Conhecimento Pacote Office, principalmente Excel (intermediário);
Raciocínio analítico para compreender o todo, a partir de uma visão sistêmica;
Boa Comunicação, concentração, resiliência e trabalho em equipe.

Informações adicionais

O que te oferecemos como diferencial!

Ambiente em plena transformação;
Atuação global.
Ampla exposição a diferentes áreas da empresa, com desafios de negócios assim como de TI;
Temos muito cuidado com o bem-estar dos nossos colaboradores! Em nossos escritórios, mantemos uma estrutura que conta com diversos profissionais e serviços ligados à saúde como massagem, RPG, psicólogo, sala de relaxamento e muito mais! Além disso, temos alguns benefícios diferenciais como licença maternidade e paternidade estendida, horário de trabalho flexível, programa de participação nos lucros e resultados e o Share Saving - programa de ações para todos os funcionários da Experian!

Não atendeu todas as competências descritas na vaga? Estudos mostram que mulheres, pessoas não brancas e PcD deixam de se candidatar em vagas que não atendam 100% dos requerimentos. Aqui na Serasa Experian nós somos dedicados a criar um ambiente diverso e inclusivo. Se você gostou dessa vaga mas sua experiência não se encaixa totalmente, não se preocupe, nós te encorajamos a se aplicar de qualquer forma para que seu perfil seja avaliado!

2023/06/26 22:38:30 - Getting text on element :: 

2023/06/26 22:38:30 - The text is :: 'Sobre a vaga
About Us

WEX is a global leader in financial technology solutions, based in Portland, Maine, United States, with over 6,000 WEXers distributed in over 40 countries. We simplify the complexities of payment systems across continents and industries like Fleet, Corporate Payments, and Benefits. We look to manage employee benefits, streamline how companies pay and get paid by suppliers, save on fuel costs, or modernize how companies manage their fleet, WEX solutions reduce the administrative burdens.

About The Opportunity

We are seeking an experienced Data Engineer to play a critical role in the development of WEX's enterprise data & analytics capabilities. You will be part of an organization focusing on the development and delivery of data solutions and capabilities for WEX’s data platform. The successful candidate is motivated by thinking big data, technically proficient, and enjoys working in a fast paced environment.

You Will Be Expected To

At WEX, we treat data and data artifacts as first-class citizens. They form our backbone and drive the business insight we generate. We are looking for an experienced Qlik Replicate Administrator to join our Data Engineering & Operations team. You’ll work with on-premise and cloud databases to configure source/target end points and create high performing data replication tasks. You’ll be part of a team that is also responsible for:

Continuously training our SRE team to handle L1 and L2 production support issues
Monitoring production servers, scheduled jobs, and incident management
Developing standards, best practices, and how-to guides
Mentoring other Data Engineers to create robust tasks
Understanding Qlik’s product roadmap, including depreciated/new features, patch & version releases, and QCDI, to make adjustments to our data pipelines
Working with DBAs to configure source databases and Qlik endpoints
Working with DevOps to address network changes (VPC peering, subnets, firewalls, etc.)

You’ll be part of a collaborative scrum team that consists of an Agility Engineer, Technical Program Manager, Data Engineers, QA, and DevOps. You’ll also be supported by a manager that is here to listen and help you grow.

We Are Looking For a Professional Who Has

You care deeply about the veracity (i.e. consistency, accuracy, quality, and trustworthiness) of data. You enjoy designing, maintaining, and optimizing data pipelines & infrastructure, for data collection, management, transformation, and access. In addition, you:

Are a strong critical thinker with analytical and problem-solving abilities
Are self motivated and able to work independently with minimum supervision
Bring thought leadership to your area of responsibility and enjoy staying ahead in your field

This position requires you to collaborate across multiple groups at WEX, so you are someone with excellent communication skills and persuasive power. You can make rational arguments for action to evoke positive responses.

You Possess The Following Skills And Experiences

Our core stack for this position consists of Qlik Replicate, Snowflake, AWS Services, and various RDBMS.
Advanced knowledge of Qlik Replicate and Enterprise Manager, managing endpoints and streaming CDC (change data capture) tasks
Solid SQL skills and understanding of query optimization strategies in Snowflake; plus, ability to monitor, visualize and optimize the end-to-end database execution flow with a keen focus on performance and correctness
Fundamental understanding of the following AWS services:
Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) - performance monitoring & optimization and knowledge of instance types
Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) - provisioning of virtual networks and all its basic components (security group, network access control list, route tables, subnet, etc.)
S3, IAM, Secrets Manager, AWS CLI
Mastery of RDBMS concepts, specifically the mechanics of transaction logs, RBAC, standby configuration/availability groups, encryption, and datatypes
Bonus: You have successfully implemented CI/CD of Qlik Replicate tasks in a production environment.

If you are looking for a growing career – come be part of WEX today!'

2023/06/26 22:38:34 - The text is :: 'Sobre a vaga
International company of more than 8 000 employees in the world, HQ in Europe, leader in agricultural solutions.

With a structure on a human scale, it places the experience of its employees at the heart of all its managerial concerns.

Business Developer - Animal Nutrition - Brazil
Permanent contract – Location possible in Sao Paulo, Porto Alegre, Minais Gerais

Reporting to the LATAM manager, you will be in charge of the commercial development of the area with a customer base in the animal nutrition sector.

On a daily basis, your missions consist of :
- Prospect and develop the loyalty of a clientele of manufacturers and distributors.
- Take responsibility for your area and optimize your results (margins, volumes, market share)
- Develop and manage major animal nutrition accounts in your area
- Collect and analyze market information (market research, competitive intelligence, regulatory intelligence)
- Ensure regular reporting related to your commercial activity
- Be a driving force behind development/growth opportunities

An integration process including a training period as well as technical and commercial support will ensure that you are quickly operational in the animal nutrition market.

Profile required:
With a degree in business, veterinary or Agri/Agro engineering, you have 5 to 10 years of commercial experience in B to B, in the agricultural sector, ideally in animal nutrition additives.
You are a dynamic and pragmatic field person! Reactive and committed, you have excellent interpersonal skills and a real taste for challenge and development.
English and Portuguese are mandatory.
Travel within Brazil is expected up to 50%.'

2023/06/26 22:38:37 - The text is :: 'Sobre a vaga
Principal Data Scientist

São Paulo-SP, Brazil or Porto Alegre-RS, Brazil

Who We Are

In 2021, Poatek was acquired by WillowTree, an award-winning digital product consultancy recognized as one of the fastest growing and best places to work in the United States. Now a TELUS International company, with offices across the globe, we continue to partner with the world’s leading brands, such as the NBA, Capital One, HBO, PepsiCo, Domino’s and more, to design, build, and transform their digital products and strategies. We’re looking to grow our Poatek offices in Brazil with top talent excited to collaborate with team members across the globe to deliver innovative solutions for our clients.

Location and Flexibility

This is a hybrid role, which we’ve termed Work from Near (WFN). This model requires the ability to work on-site from our São Paulo or Porto Alegre office throughout the week based on team needs, while still providing the flexibility to work remotely on other days. Our WFN culture is designed to foster in-person innovation, collaboration, and connection with team members local and visiting from other global offices.

The Opportunity

As a Data Scientist on our team, you'll design, develop, and deliver machine learning solutions, decipher loosely defined problems using complex datasets, and determine appropriate analytical and modelling techniques. You'll analyze structured and unstructured data, establish automated processes for large-scale modelling, perform exploratory analysis, and collaborate with peers on data acquisition and exploration, demonstrating a strong sense of ownership and urgency.

Responsibilities

Work on all aspects of the design, development and delivery of machine learning enabled solutions for our clients;
Come up with solutions to loosely defined business problems by leveraging pattern detection over complex datasets across multiple platforms;
Determine analytical approaches and modeling techniques to evaluate scenarios and potential future outcomes;
Analyze and interprets data from structured and unstructed data sources in both batch and streaming modes;
Establish efficient, automated processes for large-scale modeling;
Perform ad-hoc exploratory and explanatory analysis;
Become part of a highly skilled and geographically distributed team;
Collaborate with peers on problem definitions, data acquisition, data exploration, visualization as well as building the tools that support this process;
Strong sense of ownership, urgency and drive.

Qualifications

A Bachelor and/or Master degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science or other related subject
Strong command of statistical programming languages (especially R and Python)
Model development in Python (machine learning, recommendation engines)
Big Data Hadoop work experience (either integration the models with the tools in Hadoop or other)
Software development experience from scoping, requirements design, development, integration, testing, go live to PROD (vs internal research work)
Experience working with Bank raw data (credit card, customer, product, real-time and batch)
Other programming experience (Spark, SAS, Scala, Java, etc.) is a huge plus
Experience in working with large datasets and relational databases is highly desirable (SQL)
Ability to work on distributed cloud platforms
Exceptional written and verbal communication as well as presentation skill
Curiosity and an investigative profile: you’re a data-driven problem solver!

Why Poatek?

Besides being part of an innovative consultancy company with an international culture, you will have:

Be part of an innovative consultancy company
Flexible hours and autonomy
Work in international and agile projects
International travels
Voucher for health activities
English classes
Support in national and international courses
Food allowance
Snacks, drinks and video game in the office
Work in a company with highly-skilled professionals
Transportation or parking spot
Annual attractive bonus.

Equality is a principle here at Poatek. We are committed to building an inclusive team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences. Therefore we provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants regardless of race, color, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, age, or disability.

We will only use the information you provide to process your application and to produce tracking statistics. Since we do not request personal data deemed sensitive, we ask you to abstain from sharing those information with us.

For more information on how we use your information, see our Privacy Policy.'

2023/06/26 22:38:50 - The text is :: 'Sobre a vaga
Instantâneo da posição

“Para a Nestlé, o respeito pela inclusão, diversidade e igualdade de oportunidades é muito importante. Buscamos fortalecer o propósito de ter equipes diversas e contemplar todas as comunidades, culturas e idades.”

Localização: Ituiutaba - MG

Área: Finanças & Controle

Reporte: Gerente Planejamento Financeiro

Temos algum colaborador mapeado: Não

Resumo da posição

Entrar na Nestlé significa que você está se juntando à maior empresa de alimentos e bebidas do mundo. Em nosso núcleo, temos um ambiente humano: pessoas apaixonadas que são movidas pelo propósito de melhorar a qualidade de vida e contribuir para um futuro mais saudável.

A pessoa que irá ocupar a posição de Analista Planejamento Financeiro JR, deverá monitorar e consolidar o custo, através da melhores práticas e estratégias da companhia. Assegurando, um envolvimento orientado ao negócio, controle de valores alinhados à legislação e instruções internas. Buscar assegurar a produção ao menor custo, alinhado com os objetivos e desafios estabelecidos.

Um dia na vida de...
Elaborar plano operacional, Dymanic Forecast, CPVs de produtos e cálculo de preço;
Analisar as variações/desvios de materiais e de custos tomando as medidas corretivas quando necessário;
Analisar as contabilizações no SAP;
Analisar preço de materiais (materias-primas, material de embalagem, semi-fabricado, etc.);
Analisar ordens de processos/compras/manutenções;
Apurar o custo da utilidades (vapor, água, energias, tratamento de esgoto e ar comprimido);
Calcular e controlar provisões de despesas;
Realizar planilhas de faturamento;
Reconciliar contas contábeis;
Contar estoques de matérias-primas, material de embalagem e produtos terminados;
Inventariar estoques;
Construir e enviar informações de KPI's e relatórios de custo da unidade;
Acompanhar processos fiscais, venda de materiais irrecuperáveis.

O que fará você obter sucesso?
Formação Superior em Ciências Contábeis, Administração ou Economia;
Desejável Inglês intermediário, Power BI, conhecimento em SAP;
Domínio do pacote office.
Experiêcia em rotina de fabricação, armazém e custo industrial.
Nós somos a Nestlé, a maior empresa de alimentos do mundo. Somos 308,000 pessoas com o firme propósito de melhorar a qualidade de vida e contribuir para um futuro mais saudável. Os nossos valores são baseados em respeito: respeito por nós mesmos, pelos outros, pela diversidade e pelo nosso futuro. Com mais de CHF 91,4 bilhões em 2018, temos ampla presença em 85 países, com 413 fábricas. Acreditamos que as pessoas são o nosso ativo mais importante, portanto ofereceremos um ambiente de trabalho internacional, dinâmico e inclusivo, com muitas oportunidades em diversos negócios, funções e localidades, trabalhando com equipes e culturas diversas. Quer saber mais? Visite a nossa página: www.nestle.com.'
